meanings.sent1: The artmakers in the class painted beautiful pictures.
meanings.sent2: We visited a gallery filled with talented artmakers' works.
meanings.sent3: The artmakers decided to have a paint-off to see who was the best.
meanings.sent4: Her studio was a hive of activity, with artmakers buzzing around like bees.
meanings.sent5: The artmakers' passion for creativity shone through in their artwork.

meanings.sent1: Watching the artmakers at work was inspiring.
meanings.sent2: Artmakers often spend hours perfecting their craft.
meanings.sent3: The artmakers' dance with colors and shapes was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: The artmakers' creativity flowed like a river onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The artmakers' dedication to their craft was evident in every stroke.

meanings.definition: The tools or materials used to create art.
meanings.sent1: The artmakers carefully selected their brushes and paints.
meanings.sent2: Artmakers need high-quality materials to produce great art.
meanings.sent3: The artmakers' toolbox was filled with all sorts of creative treasures.
meanings.sent4: The artmakers' palette was a rainbow of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The artmakers' studio was a treasure trove of artistic supplies.
